text.section: There is a Warrant Apprehension Unit in the Division of Parole and Probation.

A parole and probation employee who is authorized to make arrests under this section shall:
meet the minimum qualifications required by the Maryland Police Training Commission; and
complete satisfactorily the training prescribed by the Maryland Police Training Commission.
A parole and probation employee who is authorized to make arrests under this section may also exercise the powers of a peace officer and police officer.
